page.title: 11A Day In The Life Of Chris.
page.content: At 8:00 a.m.Mum wakes me up.I go down for breakfast and have a sandwich and a cup of tea and at 8:30 a.m.I get dressed. I wait for Mrs.Hughes who takes me to school.School starts at 9:00 a.m.I usually play with Jamie Grundey, Stephen Lloyd,Paul Jones and Sven Wood.Before going into school we play rugby. On Fridays we have multiplcation table tests and handwriting. There are two playtimes and one dinnertime.I take sandwiches for my lunch. At 3:30 p.m. school finishes. At 6:00 p.m. we have tea,which is usually potatoes, carrots and meat of some kind. After tea I practise break dancing because television on Fridays is boring.At 9:00 p.m.I go to bed and read for a while.
